channel.title: Procrastination on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Procrastination on mattischrome

item.title: On learning new tools
item.description: It strikes me that it is better to sit and think about what you need to do, rather than endless try out new tools and hoping you end up with a use for them. I’m not saying that innovation is bad, or that you shouldn’t stretch yourself into some new spot once in a while, but you will become more valuable to others if you can identify what it is you are supposed to be doing and then use your existing skills to get that job done.
